Title: Serve the revolutionary people of the world
Designer: Tianjin tielu fenju zhigong yeyu san jiehe chuangzuozu (天津铁路分局职工业余美术三结合创作组)
Publisher: Tianjin renmin meishu chubanshe (天津人民美术出版社)
Notes: Chinese worker in Africa, helping to build the TanZam or TAZARA Railway, linking Tanzania and Zambia. The railway was built between 1968 and 1976.
Theme: Foreign Friends: African FriendsThe TAZARA Railway
